title: Welcome!
message: Thank you for joining our platform. We hope you have a great experience.

title: Update Available
message: A new update is available for your account. Please check the update details.

title: Reminder
message: Don't forget to complete your profile setup to get the most out of our features.

title: System Maintenance
message: We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance on Saturday, 10th August. Services may be intermittent.

title: Security Alert
message: We detected a login attempt from an unrecognized device. Please verify your recent login activity.
